neighbors.name: New Sunshine Fund LLC
neighbors.claims: In July 2022, Walton Global sold approximately 92 acres within Eloy’s Sunshine Industrial Park (part of a larger 277-acre master plan) to an undisclosed buyer for industrial development [Walton Global — news, 2022-07-15](https://walton.com/walton-global-sells-land-in-sunshine-industrial-park/). The site was described by Walton Global executives as “prime real estate” with access to two major interstates (I-10 and I-8) and a Union Pacific rail line, intended to attract businesses and jobs to the area [Walton Global — news, 2022-07-15](https://walton.com/walton-global-sells-land-in-sunshine-industrial-park/). The purchasing company’s identity was withheld at the time of the transaction for market reasons [Walton Global — news, 2022-07-15](https://walton.com/walton-global-sells-land-in-sunshine-industrial-park/). The connection between this specific entity and the global "Sunshine Fund" investment platform could not be definitively verified in public records for Pinal County.
neighbors.influence_justification: Controls a significant strategic industrial parcel (approx. 92 acres) with rail and interstate access; originally purchased from a major land asset manager.

approach_recommendations.engage: Monitor Pinal County planning/zoning filings to identify specific development plans; engage via registered agent or property tax contact address once available.

neighbors.profile_summary: New Sunshine Fund LLC holds approximately 92 acres in the Sunshine Industrial Park, acquired from Walton Global in 2022. The site is strategically located near I-10/I-8 and Union Pacific rail lines. Detailed beneficial ownership remains opaque.

citations.claim: In July 2022, Walton Global sold approximately 92 acres within Eloy’s Sunshine Industrial Park...
citations.title: Walton Global Sells Land in Sunshine Industrial Park

citations.claim: The site was described by Walton Global executives as “prime real estate”...
citations.title: Walton Global Sells Land in Sunshine Industrial Park

neighbors.verification_notes: Removed claim linking entity to 'The Sunshine Fund' (sunshine.fund) as the provided research only links that fund to projects in Texas and New Mexico; no definitive Arizona link found. The name 'New Sunshine Fund' likely derives from the 'Sunshine Industrial Park' location. Entity classification changed to 'land_investment' pending development filings.

neighbors.name: Blue Beacon International Inc
neighbors.claims: Blue Beacon International, Inc. is a privately held corporation headquartered in Salina, Kansas [Zippia — Blue Beacon Locations, retrieved 2026-02-12](https://www.zippia.com/blue-beacon-international-careers-16956/locations/). It has been identified in federal court filings as a Kansas corporation [Justia — Blue Beacon Int'l Inc v. American Truck Washes, 1994](https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/FSupp/866/485/1376181/). The company’s leadership includes President Trace E. Walker [Oregon Secretary of State — Foreign LLC Filing, retrieved 2026-02-12](https://records.sos.state.or.us/ORSOSWebDrawer/Record/5348395/file/document?inline) and Director Michael B. Walker [Jefferson County Records — Document 1105736131212000000000001, 2013-12-12](https://veritaglobal.net/jeffersoncounty/document/1105736131212000000000001). Blue Beacon owns and operates a truck wash at 1172 S. Sunshine Blvd in Eloy (I-10 interchange), located near the project site [Zippia — Blue Beacon Locations, retrieved 2026-02-12](https://www.zippia.com/blue-beacon-international-careers-16956/locations/). The company is listed as a top employer in Eloy, indicating significant local economic presence [Zippia — Eloy AZ Jobs, retrieved 2026-02-12](https://www.zippia.com/eloy-az-jobs/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Identified as a top 10 employer in Eloy; long-standing operational business at a key interchange.

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with the local Blue Beacon manager to address any construction or traffic concerns; keep communication open to ensure the project does not impede their access or operations.

neighbors.profile_summary: Blue Beacon International Inc. is a Kansas-based corporation operating a truck wash facility at 1172 S. Sunshine Blvd in Eloy. It is a significant local employer with no known history of land-use disputes in the county.

citations.claim: Blue Beacon International, Inc. is a privately held corporation headquartered in Salina, Kansas
citations.title: Blue Beacon Truck Washes Locations

citations.claim: It has been identified in federal court filings as a Kansas corporation
citations.title: Blue Beacon International, Inc. v. American Truck Washes of Iowa, Inc.

citations.claim: The company’s leadership includes President Trace E. Walker
citations.title: Oregon Secretary of State Filing

citations.claim: The company is listed as a top employer in Eloy
citations.title: Jobs in Eloy, AZ

neighbors.verification_notes: Updated corporate domicile to Kansas based on court filings. Upgraded Influence to Medium based on status as a top employer in Eloy. Removed unverified Oklahoma incorporation date.
